website_summaries.verdict: Great for those looking for a moisturizing body oil blend.
pros: Combination of organic olive, lavender, almond and grapeseed oils
cons: The squirt bottle can make a mess

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE!
customer_reviews.text: I read that this oil will fade brown spots, but didn't know whether to believe it or not. I had some VERY stubborn ones on the sides of my face that I had tried just about everything to correct. But this stuff did it after applying it to them night and day for about a week or so. It works best on my face. I can't say it does a lot for dry skin elsewhere, however. UPDATE ON BROWN SPOTS: I can't explain it, but same brown spots which disappeared at first have come back. So didn't want people having too much confidence in my review about their disappearance.
customer_reviews.author: October

customer_reviews.title: I’m not the type of person to buy this kind ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m not the type of person to buy this kind of product, but by the persuasion of my girlfriend, I was talked into it. I’m also not the type of person to write reviews about products. However, this product is the real deal. Two days after receiving my shipment, I immediately ordered two more bottles. I don’t even have a need for two more bottles. I just went into panic mode thinking end-of-the-world scenarios and tried to envision myself without this oil. I couldn’t imagine it. So here I am, writing this review with my silky smooth face, waiting for the end of the world, where I’ll obviously be the most prepared human...in terms of facial oil preparedness.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Thomas Fields

customer_reviews.title: Relieves  itchy scalp
customer_reviews.text: I waited until my 3rd bottle because I wanted to be really sure about the product. I love this oil. I just purchased my 5th bottle. I have a very dry itchy scalp. While peppermint works for me, my husband can't stand the smell. Then I discovered this oil. It has a very light scent that is not so overpowering which keeps my scalp moisturized and itch-free. This bottle is worth it for me. I will recommend this to everyone. They have great customer service too.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Works for this old prune!
customer_reviews.text: I actually really love this oil but it does smell very strong of lavender. However, the scent does dissipate quickly. I think some people that feel it's greasy are possibly using too much of the product. For me it takes very little of the oil to get soft smooth skin that lasts all day. Unlike lotions that seem to only work for a few hours. I would like to see less lavender scent... maybe go with more of a Bulgarian lavender with the Rose undertones. Otherwise, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ghoops

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't use alone
customer_reviews.text: I use the oil and tea tree and my skin has never been better. This only after 1 week.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great smell to start, horrible smell few hours later
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this. The initial smell is AMAZING. The overall feel during and after application is great! However, not sure if it's my PH combined with this oil but after a few hours the smell becomes strong and seems almost like BO which is embarrassing! Again, really want to love this and maybe it's just me but the scent after a few hours was horrible. Maybe I can use it just on my cuticles or something like that to not throw it out?
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Organic Blend of Olive, Lavender, Almond and Grapeseed oils  for Skin,
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product which may work, in time, the smell is so offensive I would never apply it, as is, to any living thing I might remotely come in contact with. My dogs were offended by the smell and that means they would not come near me till I washed it off and that tells me everything. Also, I opened the container to adjust the smell with essential oils so I I COULD use it. Buyer beware of the strong musty old man smell of this product line. Yikes...!
customer_reviews.author: J. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizing oil for face, scalp and body. Wonderful customer service..
customer_reviews.text: Really great moisturizing oil. I bought the Original formula which has a very nice light lavender scent which smells good, but on migraine days, I can't use because my sense of smell is super sensitive. I reached out via email and the Co-Founder Maria followed up by sending the Unscented version free of charge, letting me still keep the Original bottle. The Unscented still has lavender, but maybe less in amount in the total formula, as there's no slight lavender scent. The oil is great for the scalp, face and skin without a heavy greasy feel. Highly recommended the product for it's quality and excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Matt J

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong Smell.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using different oils on daily basis. This stuff has a very strong smell and you will not want to apply it and leave the house. it didn’t even help with the dry scalp issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sai

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend buying for sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Very oily and gave my skin a rash. Wouldn’t recommend buying for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C.

customer_reviews.title: A Perimenopausal woman's Dream Oil...
customer_reviews.text: This oil is everything! I am having Perimenopausal skin itching due to what I researched and found was a histamine response of some sort due to hormonal fluctuations. Many women get this instead of those lovely hot flashes. At times the itching was intense Especially in the evenings. This right here stops it on contact and to take it even further I mixed from the very beginning with Tea tree therapy ointment...And MERCY MY... I was made New...And the Smell is Beyond Heavenly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skin irritation within few days
customer_reviews.text: I was initially very existed to use this oil and the smell is great. After few days of using, my skin started to become increasingly itchy and it turned red locally. The same happened to my husband, so we stopped using it. After stopping it, my skin returned to normal. After this incident, I made a few search on internet and I found out that the company is importing from China so I am not even sure the oil is really from Greece.
customer_reviews.author: Prinbe

customer_reviews.title: This Oil is a Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oil in hopes it would help my husband with his radiation burns, and I am happy to report it works! The product arrived yesterday, and we used it immediately after unpacking it. We sprayed the oil on his neck (where the burns are), then carefully dabbed it in with a reusable makeup pad, we had moistured with cold water. This morning already we saw significant improvement of the burned skin. I am glad I found this product that doesn’t contain any artificial or harsh ingredients, and thus doesn’t burn, even on very sensitive, damaged skin!
customer_reviews.author: Martina Kilgo

customer_reviews.title: It's like magic!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I've only been using this for 6 days, and my mind is absolutely BLOWN!!! I've been using it on my face, body, and hair. My hair has been super soft, it's helped clear up some eczema, rashes, and razor burn, and my acne has started to clear up as well! I would 100% recommend this to EVERYONE! I had no course it would have visible results in such a short amount of time. It smells fantastic and absorbs in very quickly so you don't feel oily all day/night.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for oil to help me with my dry scalp as I have lot of dry flakes falling from my hair. I was excited seeing all the good reviews and ordered it. After applying the oil I realized my hair is even more drier now and it didn’t even help with the dry scalp issue. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best products I have ever used for skin care! I posted a before and after picture of the same hand about 6 weeks apart. It seems of have tighten my skin and lightened my age spots. It has also helped my varicose veins. I use it three times a day. It has a very pleasing sent as well. It does not leave a greasy feel and dries well. My tan in the second photo has worn off a bit so that's why my hand appears different in the two pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie V.

customer_reviews.title: Leaves Your Skin Radiant and Glowing
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin so I am very picky about what I apply to my face and body. After reading the reviews and researching the ingredients, I decided to give it a try. This stuff is AMAZING and I am completely addicted. I mix it with my face lotion and apply nightly. It leaves my skin glowing and radiant. I have zero makeup on in my pic and I feel beautiful. I am 47 years young. Love, love, love ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Rita Vandermolen

customer_reviews.title: had to return
customer_reviews.text: This oil had such a strong, overwhelming smell I just couldn't use it and had to return it. I'd be very surprised if this is truly a natural non-toxic ingredient product. I also no longer buy items like these that are only sold on Amazon and nowhere else.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Very fantastic awesome Greek Organic Product
customer_reviews.text: I started using this organic Greek oil a few weeks ago and it really did wonders for my hair and scalp oil started growing my hair better and the smell is awesome very sensational pleasant smell I like it and I'm ordering another bottle today one bottle will last me over a month so I use it everyday once a day on my scalp makes my hair soft and manageable with less breakage. Also I added some to my hand lotion and my nails are growing beautifully and strong. Try it I believe you will like it you won't be disappointed ☆☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband who has psoriasis. He said he could see an improvement after the first use. He continues to use it on a daily basis, & is surprised with the results...He said the psoriasis is much improved. Will keep this on hand Indefinitely!!
customer_reviews.author: nodakian

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have super sensitive and really dry skin. I am allergic to almost every skin cream I have bought (all the extra chemicals no doubt....have you ever looked at the list of ingredients?) This blend of oils is amazing and in just theee days my skin glows, the dryness is COMPLETELY gone and I am getting compliments on my skin. I am 55 and I do have some wrinkles but they are looking less apparent as this product sinks in through my pores. I LOVE this so much. It does go on oily but give it 10 minutes and it sinks in. I will never use anything else to Moisturize my skin !
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister-in-law for Christmas 2 years ago and she has been raving about it ever since. I finally ordered some and I LOVE it. My Mom loved it too so I ordered two more bottles so we could have one in our bedrooms and one in the kitchen. I use it after I shower, on my heels, hands, elbows, all over, really. And I even use a small amount on my hair. I have noticed a huge change in my feet, which are much smoother now. I love it, and it smells great!! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: The oil itself is fine, smells nice and is nice on the skin
customer_reviews.text: The oil itself is fine, smells nice and is nice on the skin. Taking stars off for the packaging. The gold on the label of the bottle came off to my hands over time (specially when there is oil on hands the gold comes right off and then you have glitter everywhere). And now that i am about 3/4th done with the bottle the sprayer is not working that well. Perhaps too fine for such thick oil.
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Remedy
customer_reviews.text: As I have gotten older I have developed an extremely itchy dry scalp. After reading the ingredients and reviews I decided to try The Greek Remedy....I have been amazed! After showering I rub The Greek Remedy thoroughly into my scalp.. The itching has completely stopped..... and any flaking is easily manageable!!!! The lady who cuts my hair couldn't believe the improvement in my scalp... I hope this is not too much TMI, but for me The Greek Remedy has been magical......
customer_reviews.author: ScorpioDF53

customer_reviews.title: Great product and excellent customer support!!
customer_reviews.text: I received my item and this will be my second bottle, the first bottle being a gift for my mother. On applying the oil, it might initially appear to be sticky but within few minutes the oil is absorbed into the skin. The oil does not have overpowering scent and I have applied it on both skin/hair. The spray works great and bottle has a good durable material. This product probably will work very well for most people especially those who stay in air-con environment or in cold weather places. I will continue to use this and update my review based on my usage after few months.
customer_reviews.author: Sanj

customer_reviews.title: I don’t understand
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what happened to the other reviewers this oil is soooo greasy and doesn’t absorb right away like the other reviews mentioned... I applied on my face before i go to bed it was too oily so I thought it will absorb when im sleeping but nope. My face was still so greasy in the morning i didn’t feel any soft or whatever like that oh and smell wasn’t even attractive... seriously, I don’t understand the other reviewers... I don’t know if i still wanna use this oil... very disappointed or maybe I expected too much
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: I love this for my hair
customer_reviews.text: This is a great everyday hair oil because it's not too greasy and it smells amazing. I use this every day to add moisture. I have long, soft waves, medium thick, dry Mediterranean hair and I live in Florida. I also wash my hair every 3-5 days. This keeps my hair smooth and moisturized and it smells great. I wouldn't use this on my skin because I have sensitive skin, but it's amazing for hair. One pump in the morning and one pump before bed applied to my hair has been a game changer.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Product!!!! Great for hair, nails, skin! Not too strong of a fragrance, oily but absorbs in less than 5 minutes. Does burn if you get it around lips, mouth, eyes so be careful. I got it on my lips twice accidentally and it then got into my mouth and both times i experienced a burning, tingling sensation for about 10 minutes. Other then that I am 100% addicted to this product! Great price and a little goes a long way so a bottle will last for months! Wish I would have found this 20 years ago!!!
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice oil, it absorbs quickly
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice oil, it absorbs quickly, leaves skin feeling smooth, and the lovely aroma is very soothing. I apply after bathing at night as well as on my hands during the day, I do lots of yard work, so the quick absorption is great. I highly recommend this oil. If you have any questions, the customer service goes beyond most in their effort to provide A+ customer care. An excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: BroomeSwept

customer_reviews.title: Get this!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have very, VERY, dry skin on my face. I tried so many different creams, oils, and serums that I couldn’t possibly remember them all. The dry, cracked skin around my nose was really hurting me and I was going crazy trying to find a solution. This oil was a Godsend. After I was my face at night, I use a moisturizer and pat this oil in and it has made a world of difference. My skin is slowly getting better. The skin is not completely normal, but such an improvement. Can’t recommend this enough.
customer_reviews.author: Marz

customer_reviews.title: When it comes to customer service, BOG is second to none!!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this moisturizer for my daughter, who suffers from eczema. What I failed to see was they actually carry an unscented version! The Lavender scent is quite strong, and my daughter, unfortunately, was not able to tolerate it. I did reach out to the owner who went above and beyond, to make make things right. She exceeded my expectations of what a company who truly values its customers does.
customer_reviews.author: GoPackGo

customer_reviews.title: Scalp got worse
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be the cure for my non-dandruff dry flaky scalp but it was not. My scalp got more flaky and it irritated my scalp that I had red marks and patches all along my hairline. I stopped using it and the red marks disappeared. I may try this on my skin somewhere other than my scalp but not sure it would be useful anywhere else. I do like the scent a lot though, not sure why the bad reviews on scent. I'm still on the hunt for an oil (not coconut) that will cure my dry flaky scalp. Le sigh.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious Moisture
customer_reviews.text: This product smells amazing. There is a light lavender scent, but the scent isn’t the magic of this gem. It’s the moisture. I was amazed at how soft my skin was after using this product. I used it on my dry hands and they felt wonderful. I also used a few drops rubbed into the ends of my dry hair. You’ll have to try this product to believe what it did for my hair. I’m so grateful I happened upon this product here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil! I have used oil for years when I get out of the shower or tub, but I love this blend a lot. I started putting it around my eyes so my makeup goes on very smooth. I noticed that my eyelashes were growing more! I love the scent and the feel... now I put on a little after I wash my face at night and a little before I put my makeup on. Radiant skin and long lashes!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Susan

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime customer!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for just about a year now, and I am still impressed at how much it has improved my skin! So glad I found something that works for sensitive skin that isn't loaded with chemicals! It moisturizes deeply while not feeling heavy on your skin, and smells so relaxing! Keep up the good work you have a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect a miracle
customer_reviews.text: Set your expectations appropriately. I had dry scalp, I needed some hair oil. This is basically olive oil that smells like lavender. As such it does what you expect olive oil to do when you dump it on your head. This is nothing fancy, they tell you the ingredients right from the outset. The combination of those ingredients don't achieve anything too fancy but if you want some olive oil to dump on your head, there are worse ways to go about it.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Stephens

customer_reviews.title: 10 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at the value and effectiveness of this product. I've recommended it to many people already. It hydrates incredibly well. Better than body oil from France better than most lotions. Get this versatile oil - you won't be sorry. You'll use it up and be back for more. LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Calley319

customer_reviews.title: Best oil for a facial
customer_reviews.text: I have written previously. I'm a return customer. This is hands down my favorite facial oil. If you use a bit each week with a bit of sugar, you have the best scrub ever. It feels as good as an expensive facial and lasts for days. I do it twice weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Joan D.

customer_reviews.title: ALL NATURAL ---  NO CHEMICALS
customer_reviews.text: I am on my 3rd or 4th bottle of this oil and it is absolutely great!!! I use it daily (a little bit goes a long way) on my face, hair, body. The scent is heavenly and light and the oils penetrate the skin without leaving an oily residue. It is definitely worth giving this product a try. Check the list of oils just to insure that you do not have an allergy to any one of them. As with any new product, start with just a small amount on the inside of one arm to check for sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I had been using organic hemp seed oil as a moisturizer base for my face and was running low. I saw the Bliss of Greece product on Amazon and decided to give it a try. I like this oil. It has a nice fragrance which dissipates, and the oil makes my skin soft. My older skin needs all the help it can get, especially with winter coming on. I will continue to use Bliss of Greece. It is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding oil
customer_reviews.text: This is the best oil I have ever used. The biggest difference I see is the effect in my under eye area. I am 61, and amazed at how moisturized my eye area is now. I wear it alone at night, applying while my face is still wet from washing. In the day time, I mix it with hyaluronic acid. But it absorbs well and works round the clock. Just ordered another bottle, in case the world comes to an end, like one reviewer said. In that event, I will be moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Jlynnc

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This just bacome my favorite oil. I use it for face, hair, body...for me and my daughter. Smell is great (mostly lavander) and its not heavy. Just perfect and what i needed. I will never switch to anything else! Strongly recommanded!
customer_reviews.author: Vnyc83

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this oil! I live in the Sonoran desert and my skin never felt truly moisturized. I ordered this oil after reading reviews and decided to give it a try. WOW! I use it on my hands, feet, hair and as a moisturizer for my face. It feels heavenly! I use it at night on my feet and they stay soft and smooth between pedicures. I loved it so much, I immediately ordered another bottle. I use Retin A and NEVER have any flaking or peeling using this oil as a moisturizer! I will always have a backup!!
customer_reviews.author: cunaz

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff for dander IMO
customer_reviews.text: I gotta say, this stuff is amazing, being a guy and finally coming around the idea that “maybe I should start taking better care of myself?” And this little bottle doesn’t disappoint! I’ve tried everything to get the dander from my hair, stash and beard. Used this for 2 days with a skin cleanser and Holy crap!! It worked!! My skin has never felt so smooth and full of life, I love it so much I got the pamper kit for my mothers Bday after a week of use. She also loves all the products and they all smell incredible
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Not for me; customer svc was great
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I could love this product! It was way too heavy for using on my face- it felt as though it clogged my pores, and just kinda sat on top of my skin. The fragrance was great. It didn’t make me itch. I contacted customer service and they left nothing to be desired in resolving the situation. Unfortunately I will not be ordering again but it’s good to know there are companies that are still interested in satisfying the customer.
customer_reviews.author: K. Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for everyone
customer_reviews.text: This oil dried out my scalp more than moisturized it. It has a strong smell, it can be pleasant or overwhelming depending on the person. It is a good oil for the skin and ends of hair but not for the scalp. (POC 4C hair)
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Walker-Cmar

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed.With.This!
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible allergies to most lotions and am frequently broken out in hives. This has been a lifesaver for my hives. I put it on when I feel a hive pop up and it calms it. I discovered this when my body was covered in hives, and I’d itched to the point I was almost bleeding. I put this on and within a few minutes the itching stopped and within 20 minutes all but the larger hives had gone away, and when I woke up they were all gone. Now I just put it on the areas prone to hives after my shower and it seems to keep them at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Gal

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing for my dry hair
customer_reviews.text: I recently turned 30 and my hair and scalp has been really dry lately, so I was looking for a product that would help restore moisture. I’ve been using it as directed for over a month, but have experienced no lasting difference - hair is just as dry (maybe even more, can’t tell for sure though) scalp just as itchy. I don’t mind the smell, unfortunately for me this product just didn’t work as advertised. Hair feels nice directly after showering, but goes back to being flat and dry within a day. Oh well, at least it isn’t expensive. Time to try something else.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: A value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Way better than I thought it would be! Comparable to my $75 organic blend that is 1/3 the size of this bottle. Could definitely charge way more so buy some at this price while you can. What was most impressive is receiving an email from the owner/CEO asking if I received the product and providing direct contact info if there were any issues. If that weren't enough...no solicitation for a review in the entire email!!! WOW! Amazing, I will buy more and feel great about it now too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC scent on multipurpose oil...LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Have used this on my flaky scalp a few times now. It has reduced itching, flaking and scalp irritation. The spray nozzle helps application to specific areas on scalp. I also use as deep conditioner for my hair, which has become drier with years of color. I apply it to my scalp and ends on dry hair for 30+ min before I shampoo. Then a bit more with conditioner. My hair is softer, shinier. I also apply to soles of my feet after daily shower scrub, and to cuticles. Softer, less dry on all counts. Best of all, the scent FANTASTIC!! Love this product!!! Thank you Bliss if Greece :-)
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent, though I try not to put it on and go right out around people. It's a pretty strong scent and those with sensitivities may have issues with it. It's soothing if you want something to apply before bed...you may find yourself sleeping better. Slightly greasy after application, but only slightly. I expect that from an oil. Have only used on my skin so far....will try to test it out on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: I do not have sensitive skin to attest to how well it will work on that but for my skin, it is amazing, it smells good, and I absolutely love the moisturizing effect!! I put this on every night before bed and I love it! I am thankful for their natural ingredients as well! I highly recommend this moisturizer to anyone that wants a beautiful scent and wants a moisturizer that will give your skin a blessing!!
customer_reviews.author: Cmhd

customer_reviews.title: Dandruff and Itch begone !
customer_reviews.text: My scalp loves this stuff. Dandruff is gone and so is the itchiness I was previously experiencing. After trying zinc and natural shampoos and getting some help but still experiencing these symptoms, this has actually rid me of these annoyances. Very glad I found the product and recommend anyone with itchy scalp or dandruff / dermatitis gives it a try. Smells and feels nice to boot !
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mannix

customer_reviews.title: Left my skin dry
customer_reviews.text: I have really dry skin, especially in the Winter. But I’ve been looking for a product that’s a really heavy moisturizer and that is natural. I read a lot of good reviews on this, so I purchased it. It left my skin feeling super dry one night, so the next night I did this moisturizer with Vaseline to see if that’d be a good combo, that didn’t work. So the next night I used it with another moisturizer, and it didn’t work. This product made my skin way dryer, and flakier than it was before.
customer_reviews.author: blessed mommy times 6

customer_reviews.title: Light and Quick Absorbing!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually put oil on my skin, but I recently got a jade roller and a Gua Sha tool; a video on YouTube recommended using oil when using the Gua Sha. Now I use this every day! The lavender scent is lovely, and my skin feels great. The only "downside" which really can't be called that, is that it absorbs so nicely that I have to use more when I'm using the Gua Sha tool, so it slides more easily on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R.

customer_reviews.title: I have almost eczema level dryness
customer_reviews.text: The issue is just as with any oil. I don't have to pour anything, but I ordered this size so that I could keep something in my purse. The plastic top cover won't stay on so why even include it, so that part is frustrating. The smell is decent. I went after the inclusion of the lavender for that reason. I don't (and can't) put o another fragrance. I love Bath and Body Works and several perfumes. So, it smells a tiny bit like incense but not in a loud or offensive sense. I had to give it 4 stars because it does what it promises to do. The oil does not last more than a little around 12 hours.
customer_reviews.author: I wanna tell you

customer_reviews.title: Silky soft
customer_reviews.text: This oil is by far one of the best I’ve used. It’s EXTREMELY moisturizing and is not greasy, although it is very rich. The smell is heavenly. I like to rub this all over my face and body after a shower before bed. My husband loves the smell as well. If you have a sensitive nose you may want to get the unscented version. Also, the company included a discount of 40% off. I liked it so much I ordered the motion as well and the foot cream. Guess what? I received ANOTHER discount! Bliss of Greece understands how to keep a customer.
customer_reviews.author: Felecia Houston

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love it so bad :( My skin is usually dry during winter, oily at the end of the day. This does moisturize my skin well but I’ve developed pimples even with a very thin layer. I put it on before sleep. I keep it away from my eyes, but the fumes still make my eyes ache. It’s a very strong lavender smell which I like but my eyes don’t. I’ll keep using it for the moisture and good smell. Haven’t tried it on my hair because my hair gets oily on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Winter moisturizer (solid choice)
customer_reviews.text: I like to give a product 4-6 weeks before reviewing, so this is early (if my pores get clogged, I’ll edit it), but I’m really loving this. Scent is light and fresh. The only oil I’ve ever been able to use on my face without breaking out was Naturopathica’s Carrot Seed Soothing Facial Oil, which is $58/ounce. I actually think this is better. Quality and price. My face doesn’t look oily either. I will definitely buy again if things continue this way for 6+ weeks. A little heavy for fine hair. Great as body oil.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Samuels Nickelthwape III

customer_reviews.title: Using as a pre-shave oil and rating as a pre-shave oil
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a pre-shave oil so I can’t attest to its uses on parts of the body outside of the scalp and parts of the face. For me at least, it eliminates razor burn and bumps. It also makes for a smoother shave and it doesn’t irritate my skin. I bought one bottle 2 1/2 months ago and after using it every other day for shaving my head and face, I have a little over half a bottle left. So, rating this product purely as a pre-shave oil, I give it five stars. As anything else? Eh. I can't see myself using it as an all purpose body oil
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Smelled awful
customer_reviews.text: Ive never spent this much on oil. I was super excited but when i got it it smelled awful.

customer_reviews.title: Essential oils did not irritate my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure this product would work for me when I ordered it. I have psoriasis, and the shampoo I was using was making my hair extremely dry and brittle. I've been applying a little of this oil to my hair after washing, and it has really softened up a lot. I've even recently started using it on my face. In the past, I've used products with natural botanicals and essential oils, and they broke out my skin. But to my surprise, this oil doesn't do that. I wouldn't necessarily use it to replace my regular facial moisturizer, but used with it together at night, it does seem to give it a bit of a boost, and it smells wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: VAL-LA

customer_reviews.title: Simple product that works great
customer_reviews.text: Having used a myriad of lotions etc to stop bleeding dry skin in the past, nothing works better than products from Bliss of Greece. My skin is more resilient and does not bleed around my knuckles or elbows anymore. K.I.S.S. "Keep It Simple Stupid" summarizes the ingredient list. It works and it's simple. Also their customer service is top notch. I received a bottle that was rancid and I emailed the company. "Keep the bottle and we'll send you another one", was the response. 1-2 days later I received a new bottle. If you have exceedingly dry skin, give their products a try. Great product from a great company.
customer_reviews.author: LDL01

customer_reviews.title: What Greece must smell like
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived neatly boxed and well packaged. No leaked at all. I received a nice email from the company with a welcome and instructions on what to do should I receive a bottle with a leak. Actual product....AMAZING!! The smell....HEAVENLY!! I have an autoimmune illness that causes extreme dryness and this oils helps tremendously! I have used it on my face and body. I have psoriasis and psoriatic arthritis as well (my life is so fun!) and I am interested in trying this on the small rashes I get in my scalp. It is well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Belflower

customer_reviews.title: Great but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: In the past I’ve always had oily skin and would never have used a product like this but in the last six months or so my skin has been so dry and flaky. I bought this based on the reviews and so far I think I really like it. It hasn’t solved my dry skin problem completely but it’s made a big difference. I was worried about breakouts but so far so good. After applying I rub the excess into my nail beds and I feel like my cuticles look much more healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Tarah

customer_reviews.title: An outstanding product with a great fragrance. Apply to wet skin
customer_reviews.text: New content- the owner Marie contacted me after reading my original review. She refunded my sales price and send a new bottle of a different product. I didn’t expect that because I didn’t feel my review was negative. I was surprised and happy that she wanted to stand by her product and please her customers. I DO like this product, but I apply it to wet skin. It HAS improved the softness and smoothness of my skin. Original review: I agree with other reviewers that the consistency is too thick, but I love the fragrance. I apply it in the shower before I pat dry. It goes on better when my skin is wet.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the value of this product, and was very happy using it, as it performs well. I was a bit skeptical because it is at a better price point than many others, but it's a good moisturizing oil for sensitive skin like mine. Too soon to tell if it will help with my rosecea, but so far, it does seem to de-redden my skin after applying. I read some of the negative reviews about the scent, but it's a natural herbal scent, something I'm used to, so I like it just fine. I'll continue to use the product and will add more info once I see the long-term results.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Penny

customer_reviews.title: Good supplement to moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I like to apply this all over face periodically with a cotton pad. The scent is delightful, and I am fussy about scents. Does not bother my sensitive skin. I use around eye area too but very carefully. Has not replaced my moisturizer, it's like a bonus occasional nighttime treatment for me. Does not make my pillow greasy. Does not cause breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality service, quality products
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my dry scalp. And it works well for me. I cannot put it in after washing my hair and leave it in. I need to do it before. So I message it in the night before. Whether you use it for your skin, hair or any other reason you will not be disappointed. I don't think you could make a quality product like this one for less. If you consider the cost of all the ingredients. The customer service is wonderful. They inquired how I was liking their product and responded to my questions immediately. This product will last a long time, a little goes along way.
customer_reviews.author: BLK

customer_reviews.title: This oil is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this skin care product more than 5 stars, it deserves it! I have extremely dry and sensitive skin, particularly on my forearms and legs. Applying this oil right after showering makes my skin as soft as baby skin. and although my skin is very sensitive I could tolerate the oil well without any issues. I personally find the smell pleasing: it is natural and with a little of what I would call "mystique", but perhaps it is not for everybody. Still, if you have dry skin I urge you to try this product. I bet you'll love it, too
customer_reviews.author: EstherSylvia Firlej-Perisin

customer_reviews.title: Too much lavender.
customer_reviews.text: I think this oil would be perfect without the Lavender, or with less of it. It's overpowering. I squirted some out when I got it and it was too much to use on my face so I put it on my hair. It feels softer and like a high quality oil, but the scent is kind of making my throat sore, so I can't imagine using it on my face. Maybe I'm allergic to lavender but I've never had an issue before. I would buy it again, if they replaced it with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Stone

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: the Ancient Greek Remedy Natures Moisturizer. I rarely do reviews since many products are hyped with little or no results so I am sure many like myself have wasted a lot of money. I am thrilled to have found this moisturizer. Only after a few days my dry winter skin is soft and radiant. A little goes a long way so keep that in mind, and it absorbs into your skin (not oily) leaving it so soft and your skin feels amazing. I look forward to trying their other products. My hubby loves it too. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Darby

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 bottles, one arrived with the seal broken. I contacted customer service thru a message they had sent to me begirecthevproduct arrived. They replaced it without question and quickly! The product smells heavenly. I gifted it to my 30-something daughter who has already tried it on her face, hair and feet. She adores it. You do t need much and it absorbs fast. It's full of good things and smells like a luscious herb garden. High quality, nicely packaged and backed by the good customer service thru claim. I'm impressed and will def buy their products again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Kat C

customer_reviews.title: Scent too overwhelming
customer_reviews.text: Received my oil today and was very excited to use it based on all the positive reviews. It was nice and moisturizing, yet not greasy. I’ve used this on my feet, hands and under eyes. The only downfall to this product is the SCENT. At first it’s a lavender scent THEN just kinda turns into a smell of (how do I describe it) like you walked into some kids dorm room and they are burning incense. Kinda musky smell. The lavender fades. Probably will not order again and just stick with argan oil.
customer_reviews.author: Kash75

customer_reviews.title: This is so absorbent and light. A great product!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is so absorbent. It is a perfect balance of a lightweight oil. I have been trying different products like this for years and I finally found one that I can put on and go to bed, without it feeling like I had put anything on. In the morning, my skin feels so much softer with no hint of oily skin. I have finally found the perfect oil for me and I think that's why they do the 100% moneyback guarantee. I'm very satisfied 🤠!
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Miracle oil
customer_reviews.text: My autistic son is a large guy and had some areas where his skin around the wrists, hands and ankles were darkening and hardening due to diabetes. His legs were also extremely dry. Lotion was no longer absorbing. This oil is wonderful, a little goes a long way and his skin is so much better It has a very clean, slightly masculine scent, but I use it as well. One bottle lasted about 2 months and I use it daily. I use it on his arms, hands, chest, legs and feet. It is a dry oil, so it doesnt stain his clothes or leave a greasy residue on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Tinamarie Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Great for contractors.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for moisturizing, makes me look dew-y, smells great, great value. But, I'm a general contractor and was recently recaulking my tub and got the caulk all over my hands. I tried everything to get the sticky goo off, rubbing alcohol, lacquer thinner, and as usual it didn't all come off. My hand were so dry after this so I though, why not and put some of this on, as relief for my dry hands, but it removed the caulk!! I've never seen a reaction like this before. This is going to be phenomenal in the field.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Simons

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Out of the blue my scalp became very dry and flaky. I went online to look for a deep conditioner of some sort and came across this and SO glad I did! I LOVE this stuff!! One it totally resolved my dry flaky scalp in one use. Two, I also use it daily on my face, neck and hands and love it for that too! I use it daily on the ends of my hair as well. My husband also stated using it on his head after he shaves and on his beard. We both love it! Will definitely keep ordering more!!
customer_reviews.author: Joey & Lynn Wilson

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this Ancient Greek Remedy Oil
customer_reviews.text: I first discovered this Ancient Greek Remedy Oil while in Athens Greece. Had my doubts when it was first recommended because often product/brands will promise many things and rarely fully deliver. This oil is wonderful, smells nice, feels awesome and best of all it’s from Greece and Organic. We been using this product for two years now and it always leaves your skin feeling magnificently soft; looking truly moisturized without being all greasy.
customer_reviews.author: MrsG

customer_reviews.title: Tames poofy hair
customer_reviews.text: I have thick C2 hair that looks great until I step into the NC summer. The humidity doesn’t make my hair frizzy- it puffs up and out. Not so cute or stylish. I didn’t have high hopes, but I put some on last night. At first the scent was strong but it quickly became nice. My hair resisted absorption so I wrapped up my hair before bed. In morning and throughout the day soft tight waves with no poof! My facial skin is very sensitive so I wiped it off my face. Now that it’s absorbed my skin is happy just like me 😊
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I am always looking for natural ways to moisturize given I have both sensitive and dry skin mostly. I wanted help with dry flaky patches on my sclap and thought it would help. It did not work, it actually caused some redness and my scalp was so itchy I had to wash my hair again. I won't try in any other place cause I'm afraid it will be the same. The scent was not bad btw it smells and feels natural but for some reason it did not worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: anais

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my whole face and it made my forehead break out so ill avoid that area. Works great on my cheeks and eyes. I have KP on my arms and it helped significantly! My arms look so smooth. Also my hands are always dry! ALWAYS! i use lots of different lotions and i have to use them all day. I put some of this on my hands after doing my morning face routine and my hands are so smooth. No more cracked thumbed. My cuticles arent cracking anymore either. Im actually super surprised. Nothing ever works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Crysta/Karen/Mike

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product, Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I'm currently very early in my pregnancy and so I bought this item to fight dry skin. It works great but I'm just sensitive to the smell right now. The seller was so prompt in responding to my issue and offered me wonderful options to address my concerns. I will definitely reccomend this product to anyone fighting dry skin because my patches were moisturized in a day while using this and much less noticeable. Thank you to the sellers for their amazing customer service as well!
customer_reviews.author: Pepperoniqueen

customer_reviews.title: Keep your skin happy and healthy...
customer_reviews.text: The included pump applicator makes controlled application easy. The oil seems to do a great job of hydrating my skin. It absorbs quickly and cleanly. I highly recommend this product for women AND men, especially as the years pass and our skin needs help keeping moisturized and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Shiny
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful but I’m a lil disappointed with it :( maybe my skin is already too oily but this stuff just makes my face way too shiny, doesn’t absorb into my skin well. Was really excited to purchase from all the great reviews. 3 stars just because it’s not their fault. Update: after contacting them about the issue they replied and sent me another item to try to help with my oily skin. Very thoughtful :) thank you !! Amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Cappygal

customer_reviews.title: Glowy not greasy
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible skin. Large pores, combination (greasy and dry scaly patches), sensitive, and redness. One pump of this on my face softens, hydrates, smooths, tightens pores. My skin glows but isn't greasy. Redness is calmed and fine lines around my eyes are plumped a little. There is a slight antiseptic smell from the lavender but it fades quickly and I don't mind it at all. It also works great on the rough parts of hands, elbows, and feet. I have thin hair and find it too heavy for hair. Please keep making this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: What every Godess uses.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about Greek Remedy products. The scent, the results, the feel of my skin. I live where the winters are 70° one day & below 30 the next. My shin skin used to look the floor of a dried up salt lake. It itched terribly. I tried everything. Everything. Greek Remedy is the only lasting relief I have found. I use it on my my legs and my face, all over my body. Glorious stuff!
customer_reviews.author: MantuaMom

customer_reviews.title: The bed oil on the market
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER write reviews but I had to after using this product. It’s 2nd to none. The smell, the texture and the way it moisturizing surpasses all other oils I’ve ever used. I use it twice a day and saw immediate results. It’s not oil and my skin LOVES it. Every single family member and friend that have tried mine have bought their own. Not only do I love this oil, but the customer service they provide is top notch. I just ordered more of their line and I can’t wait to try it. I’m a loyal customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Derber

customer_reviews.title: Only thing that doesn't irritate my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I am chemically sensitive and it was important to find something I could use on my very dry skin and hair that would not bother me. Then when I broke out in a terrible hot rash it was the only thing I could use that was light enough to not make it worse. It has been a real lifesaver. It's also helping my dry hair to improve. The smell is wonderful too.
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha Rajaniemi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I have dry skin, also (controlled) diabetes. Sometimes my skin was so dry that it would feel like it was burning. Sort of like a slight sunburn. I searched online for product suggestions, including Amazon. I was lead to this product. I mix two squirts of my favorite lotion (Curel) and two squirts of this product. It's been a total change. I use it every day and my skin feels so much better. I've seen people say they weren't compensated for their review. I wasn't compensated.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!! Total game changer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Holy grail!!! Hands down the best facial oil EVER. It hydrates and soothes my sensitive skin. Since using this I’ve had zero acne or flaky patchy breakouts. Already on my second bottle. I can’t praise this product enough. It’s better than my super expensive herbivore botanicals oils. I already have a friend of mine hooked on this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: amy bolton

customer_reviews.title: MOST INCREDIBLE PRODUCT I HAVE EVER USED!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Ancient Greek Remedy is absolutely the most incredible moisturizer I have ever experienced!!! It gives the most incredible silky smooth results that last. My skin has never felt smoother and is totally renewed!!! The scent alone is the most beautiful and relaxing scent I have ever experienced. I will no longer use a perfume either!!! I use it for my hair and scalp as I have very curly hair that I like to straightened sometimes. My cuticles are healthy and my feet feel like a baby's!!! I will never ever use another product!!! This nature's moisturizer is an absolute MUST HAVE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Rose Dusch

customer_reviews.title: Reordered this product because I liked it.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product on my face at night. At first I wasn't sure it was doing much. I truly believe nothing short of surgery will reverse what is already there on my face, but I believe that this product helps greatly in slowing down any advance in the aging process. It seems to soften my skin. It also helped in alleviating scalp itching from dry scalp from shampoos and other hair care products. My skin on my arms seem softer as well when I apply it without making my arms look oily and slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Healed cat scratched arms almost overnight.
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell, the feel, the healing properties. I am older and have skin that tears and bruises easily. I also have a cat that loves to play. I wish I had taken a before and after of my arm. I had small scratches and tiny bruises everywhere. I applied it for the first time and I could not believe it was the same arm the next day. It really does heal. I am hooked.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. I was just looking for oil to add onto my nightly skin routine, and this works perfectly. It actually doesn't feel that greasy which is nice, considering how I still have various face lotion to put on. I have not bought this to apply to anywhere else other than my face, but I noticed that this would work great as hand moisturizer or as a handcream replacement during the winter. It absorbs quickly, so there isn't that sticky feel to it for long. I would definitely recommend and buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Greek Oil
customer_reviews.text: It is really a great product and it works!! It is hard to find a multi function oil and also one that smells so good and not too greasy. It is a perfect all in 1 oil that could be used for almost what you have in mind and what you have been looking for. The price is perfect for it being a multi use product. It is also great because you get everything you need in just one oil ad not having to buy and use different oils. Highly recommended product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Packaged for preservation and ease of use, the moisturizer has a light floral scent, spreads easily, and sinks into your skin quickly. I feel my skin is deeply saturated . You are left with soft skin that isn't at all sticky - you can put your clothes on and go. Especially good for dry areas such as your feet. It is labeled as a foot balm, but I also use it on other areas that are dry. Second product I have ordered from this seller, and they really deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Been There

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I waited for a few months to write this review. This product is amazing! I bought it originally for itching skull. But I found out it not only good for hair, but also an amazing product for body. It is not sticky and no strange oil scent even you use it everyday. Works well with or without lotion. One of the best valued product I bought on Amazon. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully scented moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a combination of different oils so naturally it feels a bit greasy when you first apply it but it disappears into the skin very quickly. It has a really lovely and fresh scent that I am addicted to but you may not agree. Don't let that stop you from trying it because the scent doesn't stay strong once applied and just leaves a gentle and pleasant aroma on the skin. Best of all, the price is excellent for a natural olive oil (plus) product and the bottle is easy to use and generously sized.
customer_reviews.author: MTP

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical when I received the product because about 1/4th of the bottle had leaked out all over the package, but my hair was so extremely dry and breaking off, I decided to keep it instead of waiting for a replacement. I followed the instructions and saturated my hair with the oil and then put a warm towel on and let it stay for about 30 minutes. Then I finally worked out the amount to continue applying daily and my hair is finally manageable and healthier. I will be ordering again, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Aunt D

product_meta.title: Organic Blend of Olive, Lavender, Almond and Grapeseed oils with Vitamin E. Day and night Moisturizer for Skin, Dry Hair, Face, Scalp, Foot, Cuticle and Nail Care. Natural Body oil for Men and Women
product_meta.description:
Ancient Greek Remedy Oil is made of a 100% pure blend of Cold Pressed Olive, Organic Sweet Almond, Grapeseed, Vitamin E & Lavender Essential Oil. VEGAN, NON-GMO, GLUTEN & PARABEN FREE! Antiaging moisturizer is packed with vitamins that promote natural health and beauty solutions which are superior to any single oil. Night & day moisturizer for face, skin, hair & nails. Each of these 4 magical oils is a source of vitamins and antioxidants that creates the ultimate solution for all your skincare needs.

OLIVE OIL is full of antiaging vitamins and hydrating squalane, making it superb to use as firming body oil for smooth and even skin tone. reduces facial dark spots, promotes healthy soft and beautiful hair, it also thickens thin dry hair and is great for wavy, curly, straight & afro hair.

LAVENDER Oil is one of the most well-known essential oils in aromatherapy. Its benefits include reducing anxiety and stress, migraine and headache relief, improves sleep apnea, prevents pregnancy stretch marks, stops chronic scalp itch. Effective treatment for eczema, psoriasis, cystic acne scars, rosacea, skin discoloration, alopecia, seborrheic and atopic dermatitis.

ALMOND OIL is rich in skin and hair care vitamins including monounsaturated fatty acids, proteins, potassium, and zinc. Almond oil is popularly used as a massage oil. correct uneven skin tone & achieve firm skin. best face oil. It is also optimal for treating damaged hair and hair loss. It's considered the best natural nail and cuticle softener.

GRAPESEED OIL has plenty of nutritional and medicinal properties and has been used in many home remedies for centuries. Grapeseed oil is the perfect hand moisturizer for dry hands, dry feet, and rough cracked heels. It works wonders for tightening loose skin, frizzy hair, and itchy flaky scalp.

safe for adults, kids & baby skin care.

Buy Now with confidence and experience Ancient Greek Remedy Oil!
feature_bullets: DAY & NIGHT MOISTURIZER - Contains 4 natural raw ingredients you can trust including Extra Virgin Olive, Sweet Almond, Grapeseed, Vitamin E & Lavender Essential Oil. Best Moisturizer for face, skin, dry hair, scalp, Nails & feet. 4oz. ORGANIC, UNREFINED, COLD PRESSED OILS, VEGAN, NON-GMO, GLUTEN & PARABEN FREE. TRY US RISK-FREE! Order now, if for any reason you decide this body moisturizer is not for you, send us one email and receive a FULL REFUND OF YOUR MONEY! No need to send the bottle back!

NATURAL SKIN CARE - Anti aging moisturizer hydrates for visibly softer & smoother skin. Corrects uneven skin tone & minor skin discoloration. Calms skin irritation, hives & cystic acne. Nourishes & restores entire body moisture after sun damage & sunburn. Helps smooth fine lines & gets rid of age dark spots & wrinkles. All of these benefits with no harmful chemicals. AVOID STRETCH MARKS - Apply firming oil 3 times daily after the 8th week of pregnancy to keep your lower belly smooth & beautiful

NATURAL HAIR & SCALP CARE - 100% natural hair moisturizer provides scalp treatment for all hair types include wavy, curly, straight & afro hair. Use daily for dry scalp or flaky scalp for soft and longer rich hair. Ideal for rejuvenating & thickening of weak thin brittle hair. Moistens and nourishes dry flaky scalp. Stops chronic scalp itch for immediate and long-lasting itchy scalp relief. The best hair dandruff oil & effective natural dandruff treatment.

DRY HANDS, CUTICLE & NAIL CARE - Effective hand moisturizer that treats dry cracked hands caused by weather conditions or excessive work. CUTICLES SOFTENER - use as Cuticle remover oil, cuticle conditioner, cuticle repair, safe alternative to cuticle cream. NAIL HARDENER - Best nail moisturizer & nail strengthener, Ideal for nourishing of weak short nails. Nail treatment for nail growth Promotes strong nails, fungal free nails. faster results than nail cream with no chemicals.

PSORIASIS, ROSACEA & ECZEMA TREATMENT - Ideal for scalp psoriasis, skin psoriasis & nail psoriasis. FOR ECZEMA - safe all-natural alternative to eczema cream and eczema lotion. ROSACEA CARE- daily rosacea moisturizer for rosacea relief. a natural solution for alopecia, seborrheic & atopic dermatitis. safe for adults, kids & baby skin care. TRY US RISK-FREE! order now and if you are not 100% satisfied, simply email us and we will refund your money in the same day, NO NEED TO SEND THE BOTTLE BACK!
